channel.title: Missions (new posts)
channel.description: Posts in the forum category "Missions" - Discuss various missions, discuss strategy, give advice, etc.

item.title: season 2:
item.content:encoded: How do i loop[season 2] all my stats r lvl 20 heeeeeeellp

item.title: Jonin Ascension (S2+) Team Question:
item.content:encoded: Note the second part of the check: (or higher levels of the Allies that make it)

item.title: Jonin Ascension (S2+) Team Question: Jonin Ascension (S2+) Team Question
item.content:encoded: So, I've got Billy lv2 and Stalkergirl lv2, but I've got Pinky lv3. Part 9 requires I have the team Crazy Love Triangle, which is Billy lv2, Stalkergirl lv2, and Pinky lv2. Am I unable to complete this quest now?

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM part 2: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM part 2
item.content:encoded:
First of all, you are talking about Infiltration, don't post in a very old thread about a different quest, without even mentioning that…

Your stats are low. A team change won't help you with the G/N/T check, but you could use a jutsu. I think Delivery Art: 30 Minutes or Less will work the best, IIRC. Get more range and levels. You should be doing infiltration only after you went the easy root and done with r00t too…

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM part 2:
Help with The Reaper Council?: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded:
I'm pretty sure you only need Shorty and Strawberry as allies. There's no hidden requirements.
Over The Edge shouldn't be required to unlock The Reaper Council, though the jutsu will be needed to auto-win the last part, if you can't (or don't want to) do the 12d6s check at the end.

Double check if you have Shorty and Strawberry, and that you didn't do the quest yet. Or that you didn't hide it.

item.title: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge": Re: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
item.content:encoded: It used to be that you were required to do the quest within 15 minutes of 72 hours from when you initiated the quest; That has since long been changed to allow you to complete it any time after 72 hours have passed.

item.title: Help with The Reaper Council?: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty sure there's a hidden requirement to have your Reaper Bloodline. Go do Over the Edge and get your bloodline, and see if it unlocks.

item.title: Help with The Reaper Council?:
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I have the sword, Shorty, and Strawberry, and yet the quest won't spawn. Am I doing something wrong? Missing something?

item.title: Villages Ready to Explode?: Re: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: oh crap. i never even noticed the forum bar at the top in the game lol thanx

item.title: Villages Ready to Explode?: Re: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: Check the forums. That's what they're there for. On the far right side of the links in-game.

item.title: Villages Ready to Explode?: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: I've seent the perks of the villagers that went through the Impossible Mission and they are soooooo great. I kind of think that its an unfair advantage to the game but whatever. Anways, does anyone know of any villages that are ready to pop?

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: The easiest three bloodlines to obtain are your Basic Bloodline, Blood of the Reaper, and Wasteland Disease. Both of them are fairly simple to obtain every season; For Reaper you don't need to obtain True Blood of the Reaper, so you can stop after doing the quest Over the Edge for MC Stripeypants. As for Wasteland Disease, you get that when you get Haus.

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM:
item.content:encoded: Good question.. but it's part of being a Jonin, I am on Season 2 so the test requires 3 bloodlines.

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM: Re: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: Try to get to Jonin before you do it. How are you planing to hit diff 13 in Ninjutsu if you can't hit diff 12 in Tai? You should try to get other range boosters like the arena items and see if you can get a polar star from a generous villager (they are costly though so don't expect too much)

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.content:encoded: I'm stuck on the first part of the quest Shift Manager of DOOM. I can't pass the Tai test, I am Level 15 but only have 1 - 11 Range so I fail. What should I do? It's a BurgerNinja quest, so no allies, or jutsu. I already have Chakra Armor

item.title: Quest: Peeping: Re: Quest: Peeping
item.content:encoded: rolling challenges work in a way that if you get 15 successes out of 400 you just need to get 385 more successes. so basically you need to do the quest 27 times with 15 successes to complete it. so just work on getting as many successes as possible to save stamina.

item.title: Quest: Peeping: Quest: Peeping
item.content:encoded: It says to "drill a hole and peep! This is a Rolling Challenge!", which jutsu do I need to use for this qeust. Im sure its one of Lil' Bo's jutsu's but I don't know which one.

item.title: join Omerta village they are doing impossible mission: join Omerta village they are doing impossible mission
item.content:encoded: name says it all

item.title: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?: Re: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded:
I copied this list from the official BvS forum, there is a thread on the Village Relations board there dedicated to villages doing the IM. A few of them have exploded already but take a look at them.

  1. Tuesday, with 24 vacancies.
  2. Icicle, with 33 vacancies.
  3. Shi Kai, with 28 vacancies.
  4. NeoTokyo, with 3 vacancies.
  5. Syndicate, with 28 vacancies.
  6. Arcadia, with 22 vacancies.
  7. Steam, with 32 vacancies.
  8. Sigma, with 28 vacancies.
  9. Shinogobmi, BOOM!!!
  10. Delerium, with 20 vacancies.
  11. Jeuno, with 23 vacancies.
  12. Omerta, with 14 vacancies.
  13. Tesla , with 37 vacancies.
  14. Zuiichi , with 0 vacancies.
  15. Champloo, with 29 vacancies.
  16. NapalmLuck, with 29 vacancies.
  17. Desolate, with 23 vacancies.
